title: Shield of Stars
description: Having been befriended by only one person in his whole life, former pickpocket Weasel is devastated when his mentor, Justice Holis, is sent to prison for treason, thus with the help of a bandit and a mystery girl named Arisa, Weasel begins to plot his dear friend's escape from his unjustifiable imprisonment. 50,000 first printing.
author: Hilari Bell
